doc.field: F f0075 reute r f BC-COCA-COLA-KO>-UNIT-A 02-26 0060
COCA COLA KO> UNIT AND WORLD FILM IN VENTURE

Coca-Cola Co's Entertainment Business Sector Inc unit said it formed a joint venture with an affiliate of World Film Services to acquire, produce and distribute television programming around the world. World Film Services was formed by chairman John Heyman in 1963 to produce films.
Reuter
